name: Burden Of Scars
description:
This is a turn based RPG about inner wounds; situations that inflict scars and how you deal with them. Sometimes when the future seems bright and promising, things outside of our control force us to cope with a new reality. A reality that makes it impossible to be as we were before. The worst scars are not the visible ones and the burden they bestow can make or break you.

Let us know what you think!
